::Killfest/EndBringer/Greven/Scyther/Incarcinator/Demise/Grimmler::

Killfest recieves Darkfates comm, fires a missile at Vehement, but
frowns about retreating.

"I will stay and battle for a little while more. I will send most of
my team back though."

He sent a private comm to EndBringer, Greven, and Demise, telling them
to get back to base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer recieves Killfest's orders and runs off toward the
Blackfortress, still shocking Double Punch.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven coughs as he recieves Killfest's orders, but then collapses,
his spark extinguishing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther turns, seeing Grimmler flying out of Maximal City. He flies up
to him and swings his scythe at the Maximal's chest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incarcinator sees Menasor get hit by his charges, dodges the shots
heading for him, and fires two charges down at the gestalt's head.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise recieves Killfest's orders and runs off toward the
Blackfortress.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler shudders as a hole suddenly opens in his chest, another one
opening in his back (Syther is cloaked). He slowly slides off the
scythe, falling limply to the ground.







--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "I agree," he said over the comm. He opened the comm to all Pack
> Predacons.
> "Pack, retreat!" He transformed to beetle mode, and began drilling
back
> to the Black Fortress.
